CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Comments.​PossibleDocumentationComment
public
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Comments.​PossibleDocumentationComment

A class representing a comment found in source code which could possibly contain documentation.

Functions
PossibleDocumentationComment
public PossibleDocumentationComment ()
Properties
Javadoc
public bool Javadoc { get; set }

Whether the comment could possibly contain Javadoc content.  This doesn't mean that it does, just that it could.  It's possible for both this and XML to be true.

XML
public bool XML { get; set }

Whether the comment could possibly contain XML content.  This doesn't mean that it does, just that it could.  It's possible for both this and Javadoc to be true.

Start
public Tokenization.LineIterator Start { get; set }

The first line of the comment.

End
public Tokenization.LineIterator End { get; set }

One past the last line of the comment.

String
public string String { get }

The entire comment as a string.  Primarily used to aid debugging.

Variables

Whether the comment could possibly contain XML content.

The first line of the comment.
